name: Gmail Account Creator
description: Create Gmail accounts using real mobile IPs and antidetect browser. Returns email and password.
longDescription: Automated Gmail account registration using Proxies.sx mobile proxies and Camoufox antidetect browser. Each API call creates a new Gmail account and returns the credentials. Uses real 4G/5G mobile IPs to bypass datacenter blocks and unique browser fingerprints to avoid detection. Supports custom names, birthdate, and gender parameters.
features: Real 4G/5G mobile IPs (bypass Google's datacenter blocks)
Camoufox antidetect browser (unique fingerprint per session)
